channel.title: Need help on 317 spell outline
channel.description: hello, i'm currently trying to code this 317 source. im kinda a nooby at coding, un actually looking for a good coder to join me in server. but anyways, my problem right now, that im trying to figure out is spells. spells work and all, all i want to do is outline them when clicking on them. because currently, when you click on them. it stays the same. you can cast the spell and all, but it gets confusing because you don't know if you misclicked or not, you know. if anyone would please help me, i'd really appreciate it.

item.title: Need help on 317 spell outline
item.dc:creator: @valdez250 valdez250
item.description:
@valdez250 wrote:

ok i just looked over the cache, and yes i see all the icons. but theres no icon of ice barrage and ice blitz? and if i were to find thoses icons how do i add them in, and into the correct spots. in client.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on 317 spell outline
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:2, topic:457235”]If you mean the glowing border around the icon,
that has to be done client sided, you’ll probably have to edit the cache and add glowing ones into it[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on 317 spell outline
item.dc:creator: @valdez250 valdez250
item.description:
@valdez250 wrote:

yes thats what i mean. so it has to do with the client? not the source? can anyone try to help me fix this on my client?
